subject: INTERNATIONAL POLICE FORCE F
body:
INTERNATIONAL POLICE FORCE FROM UNIT. (INTERPOL)
RC-32657, HEATTHROW INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT COMMAND,
LONDON UK.
Attn: Beneficiary,
You are welcome to Hon.Dr. Desk of Chief Mark Dove (INTERPOL) International Police Force Unit Investigating, Working together towards a corruption-free world by Promoting and defending integrity, justice and the rule of law 'Mission statement of the International Anti-Corruption Academy, We Cover US, UK, ASIA AFRICA and other Countries. All interpol work as a Team. You have been Reported today from World security body
This is official notice to You as r report received from (FBI) Washington DC Capital of United States of America, I Know That You Have Been Waiting for the Arrival of your awaiting fund.
We need your absolute co-operation Because right now, I investigated why you have not recessive your fund and i discovered
that you have not been told the truth all this while, my dear do you know that
the Distance between you and receiving your fund is just $110 i know
this will surprise you but that is the truth of the matter.
This $110 Dollars is just a cost for CAUTIONS AND INDEX RELEASE
Certificate, it does not cost more than this and no one will tell you
this truth is that everyone wants to reap from you.
So, if you believe you can trust me then $110 is the Worth for you to
Get your long overdue payment.
Thanks
Hon.Dr. Chief Mark Dove
Inspector General of Police Force International Unity fraud. (Interpol)

subject: Re:   INTERNATIONAL POLICE FORCE F
body:
Hello Chief Mark Dove,

Thank you for reaching out and providing such detailed information. It's quite surprising to hear about this awaiting fund, as I wasn't aware of it before. 

Could you please elaborate more on the nature of this fund? How did it come into existence and why is it assigned to me? Also, could you explain what "CAUTIONS AND INDEX RELEASE" means?

I'm looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
James

subject: INTERNATIONAL POLICE FORCE FROM UNIT. (INTERPOL)
body:
INTERNATIONAL POLICE FORCE FROM UNIT. (INTERPOL)
RC-32657, HEATTHROW INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT COMMAND,
LONDON UK.

Attn: James ,

Thanks for your email. Well my office was assigned to handle the remittance
of $2.5 million dollars into your account. Therefore you're directed to get
back to me with CAUTIONS AND INDEX RELEASE Certificate, Well since you're
not ready to pay, I will report the file to the officials and as well call
off the remittance.

Thanks
Hon.Dr. Chief Mark Dove
Inspector General of Police Force International Unity fraud. (Interpol)

subject: Re: INTERNATIONAL POLICE FORCE FROM UNIT. (INTERPOL)
body:
Hello Chief Mark Dove,

Thank you for your email. It's quite an honor to be in contact with someone from the Interpol. I must say, this is all very exciting and a bit overwhelming.

I'm curious about the remittance of million dollars you mentioned. Could you please provide more details about it? How did this come about and why was I chosen?

Also, could you explain what "CAUTIONS AND INDEX RELEASE" means? I'm not familiar with these terms.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
James

subject: Attn: James
body:
INTERNATIONAL POLICE FORCE FROM UNIT. (INTERPOL)
RC-32657, HEATTHROW INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT COMMAND,
LONDON UK.

Attn: James

I believe that I am dealing with a living Human being for this
payment because I will not want a situation where you will turn back
to blame me for your failure to get paid from your fund. My treason is
because after I have let you know what to do in respect to your fund
payment you pretend as if nothing is at stake and that should be your
blame and not mine

I wait to hear from you.

Hon.Dr. Chief Mark Dove
Inspector General of Police Force International Unity fraud. (Interpol)

subject: Re: Attn: James
body:
Hello Chief Mark Dove,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, your message is a bit confusing. Could you please clarify what exactly this payment is about? And why would there be any blame involved? I'm just trying to understand the situation better.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
James

subject: Re: Attn: James
body:
INTERNATIONAL POLICE FORCE FROM UNIT. (INTERPOL)
RC-32657, HEATTHROW INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT COMMAND,
LONDON UK.

Attn: James

Sorry, nothing can be done without following the instruction given
according to our system of operation/ legal procedure

I think  you really do not understand that we are talking about your
payment because if you do then i don't think $110 will be a problem to
you,Why because we are not asking you to pay cash to us but to buy only an
itune card with that amount  as that is what will used  in processing your
payment,so you have to  comply. I wait to hear from you

Hon.Dr. Chief Mark Dove
Inspector General of Police Force International Unity fraud. (Interpol)

subject: Re: Attn: James
body:

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, your message is a bit confusing. Could you please clarify what this payment is for? And why would an iTunes card be used in processing it? 

I'm just trying to understand the situation better. Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
James

subject: Re: Attn: James
body:
INTERNATIONAL POLICE FORCE FROM UNIT. (INTERPOL)
RC-32657, HEATTHROW INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT COMMAND,
LONDON UK.

Attn: James

This payment is for you as it was stated in the file before me and the
ITUNE CARD will be using to upload your payment data based which have been
block by virus, so what this Equine card will be used for is to get up
upload and clear the Virus So that it will not affect your vital details,
that is what it is for,.
Thanks for your Understanding

Hon.Dr. Chief Mark Dove
Inspector General of Police Force International Unity fraud. (Interpol)

subject: Re: Attn: James
body:
Hello Chief Mark Dove,

Thank you for reaching out and explaining the situation to me. I'm not very tech-savvy, so I appreciate your patience. 

You mentioned an ITUNE CARD being used to upload my payment data and clear a virus. Could you please explain more about how this process works? And how did the virus get into my payment data in the first place?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
James

subject: Re: Attn: James
body:
Hello Chief Mark Dove,

Thank you for reaching out and explaining the situation to me. I'm not very tech-savvy, so I appreciate your patience. If I understand correctly, an iTunes card is needed to clear a virus that's blocking my payment data? That's quite interesting! 

Could you please explain how this process works? And how did the virus get into my payment data in the first place?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
James

body:

body:
